MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void CheckIfInstallable(string assemblyName) cil managed

summary.span: 檢查是否可以安裝指定的組件。

span.span: Checks to see if the specified assembly can be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否可以安裝指定的組件。The method determines whether the specified assembly can be installed. 若要避免擲回例外狀況，該檔案必須符合下列準則：To avoid an exception being thrown, the file must meet the following criteria: - 檔案存在。The file exists. - .NET Framework 組件檔案。The file is a .NET Framework assembly. - 公用類型可以從檔案讀取。The public types can be read from the file. - 沒有至少一個公用、 非抽象類別延伸類別，並包含屬性。There is at least one public, non abstract class that extends the class and contains the attribute. - 可以建立每個安裝程式執行個體。An instance of each installer can be created. > [!NOTE] > 如果組件有效，但包含任何安裝程式，則會擲回例外狀況。If the assembly is valid but contains no installers, an exception is thrown. 此行為不同於安裝期間，當它不是空白的組件安裝錯誤。This behavior differs from that at install time, when it is not an error to install an empty assembly. ## Examples 在下列範例中，方法套用至這兩個存在並不存在組件，且呼叫的結果會顯示到主控台。In the following example, the method is applied to both an existent and nonexistent assembly and the results of the call are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CPP/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CS/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/VB/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的組件無法安裝。

span.span: The specified assembly cannot be installed.

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 將電腦還原至安裝之前的狀態。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 復原會將電腦還原到之前安裝的狀態。A rollback restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation occurred. 呼叫方法時若方法這個執行個體，或是在安裝程式中的任何安裝程式的集合無法正確執行。The method is called if the method of this instance or of any installer in the installer collection fails to run correctly. 藉由呼叫所產生的任何例外狀況安裝程式集合中的方法，系統會忽略並繼續執行其他的安裝程式復原。Any exceptions generated by calling the method of an installer in the collection are ignored, and the rollback of the other installers continues. ## Examples 在下列範例中，呼叫方法來復原安裝程序上指定的組件。In the following sample, the method is called to undo the install process on the specified assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CPP/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CS/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/VB/assemblyinstaller_rollback.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: An that contains the post-installation state of the computer.
Removes an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來移除先前已完成的安裝。Call this method to remove a previously completed installation. 如果方法其中一個集合中的安裝程式失敗，則仍會針對其餘的安裝程式呼叫。If the method fails for one of the installers in the collection, it is still called for the remaining installers. 解除安裝失敗不會回復在電腦為其解除安裝前狀態。A failed uninstallation does not roll back the computer to its pre-uninstallation state. > [!NOTE] > 雖然和方法儲存電腦的狀態之後安裝檔案包含從`savedState`參數可能已刪除在某個時間點後安裝已完成。Although the and methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete. 刪除檔案時，如果`savedState`參數是`null`。If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`. ## Examples 在下列範例中，方法稱為安裝之後，認可組件做為參數傳遞給建構函式。In the following sample, the method is called after installing and committing the assembly passed as the parameter to the constructor. span.span: An exception occurred while uninstalling.

exception.span: 例外狀況會被忽略，解除安裝會繼續進行。

span.span: The exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.

exception.span: 不過，解除安裝完成之後，應用程式可能沒有被完全解除安裝。

span.span: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstall completes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseNewContext { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否為組件的安裝建立新 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a new object for the assembly's installation.

value.span: 如果應該為組件的安裝建立新 物件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a new object should be created for the assembly's installation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`true`建立新的檔名為"{組件名稱}。InstallLog"來記錄訊息，這個組件。Setting this property to `true` creates a new file named "{Assembly name}.InstallLog" to log messages for this assembly. 設定至`false`防止建立新的檔案。Setting to `false` prevents the new file from being created. ## Examples 在下列範例中，建立叫用建構函式。In the following example, an is created by invoking the constructor. 這個物件的屬性設定為`true`和上叫用方法`MyAssembly_HelpText.exe`組件。The property of this object is set to `true` and the method is invoked on the `MyAssembly_HelpText.exe` assembly. 因此，記錄檔訊息會顯示在主控台上。Due to this, the log messages are displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CPP/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CS/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/VB/assemblyinstaller_helptext.vb#1)]
